text.autoconfig.gravestones.title: Gravestones Configuration
text.autoconfig.gravestones.option.mainS: Whether other players should be able to retrieve a player's gravestone.
Whether the player should be sent the coordinates of their gravestone upon death.
text.gravestones.grave_coordinates: Your gravestone has spawned at [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
text.autoconfig.gravestones.option.mainS: The minumum OP level a player has to be to bypass gravestone world protection
How the items from a gravestone are retrieved.
What happens to the items when they are retrieved
